product_description: Fiskars Forged Scissors help elevate your creativity by providing a balanced blend of durability and cutting performance to all your fabric and crafting projects. Generations of sewists, artists, and makers have sought Fiskars' wide selection of premier sewing and crafting scissors when choosing their scissors. These 8-inch forged steel scissors offer superior performance and exceptional ergonomics with high-grade stainless steel blades that are precision ground for clean cuts all the way to the tip. Our forged, stainless-steel blades stay sharp longer and can be sharpened to provide continuous smooth cuts for years. An ergonomically contoured handle fits the natural shape and movement of your hand, while a bent handle design keeps projects flat for precise tabletop cutting. These all-purpose forged scissors make ideal sewing and craft scissors for all your project needs.
